Introduction

Proxima Club was a four-member South Korean independent live girl group. They made their live debut under the agency à la mode on August 8, 2021, during the Proxima Club Live event.

On July 12, 2022, Proxima Club announced their departure from the agency and their decision to continue as a self-producing girl group.

On September 9th, it was announced that Proxima Club would end their activities on October 20th with the [PROXIMA CLUB Last Live Tour], along with Miho's graduation.
